QueryResult.text: SELECT GROUP_ID, 'GROUP', GROUP_NAME, '', '', DESCRIPTION, '', -1, '', '', PROJECT_ID, 0, LANGUAGE_CODE FROM CLB_PROJ_PTCPT_GROUPS_V UNION SELECT USER_ID, 'USER', LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, USER_NAME, '', EMAIL_ADDRESS, MEMBER_GROUP_ID, PHONE_WORK, COMPANY_NAME, PROJECT_ID, IS_PROJECT_MANAGER, LANGUAGE_CODE FROM CLB_PROJECT_PARTICIPANTS_V, CMN_LANGUAGES
